case_title: United States of America v. Jenkins et al
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Jenkins et al

charges.charge_description: 18:371 Conspiracy to defraud the United States(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant committed to the custody of the U. S. Bureau of Prisons for a period of 21 months on Count One of the Indictment; supervised release for a period of three years with standard and special conditions as ordered; fine waived; defendant is ordered to pay restitution in the amount of $35,118.69; special assessment imposed in the amount of $100.00.

charges.charge_description: 18:513(a) and 2 Making, uttering &; possessing counterfeit and forged securities(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed upon motion of the United States of America

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed upon motion of the United States of America

charges.charge_description: 18:1029(a)(2)and 2 Access device fraud, aiding and abetting(5)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed upon motion of the United States of America

charges.charge_description: 18:513(a) and 2 Making, uttering &; possessing counterfeit and forged securities(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to probation for a period of three years as to Count Two of the Indictment; restitution ordered in the amount of $44,698.40; special assessment imposed in the amount of $100.00.

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed upon motion of the government.

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to probation for a period of two years on Count Three of the Indictment; special assessment imposed in the amount of $100.00; fine waived; defendant ordered to pay restitution in the amount of $1,765.00.

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed upon motion of the government.

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to Probation for a period of 2 years on Count Four of the Indictment with special conditions as ordered; restitution ordered in the amount of $1,260.00; special assessment imposed in the amount of $100.00.
